channel.title: Spatial Analysis on Yet Another Geographer
channel.description: Recent content in Spatial Analysis on Yet Another Geographer

item.title: RFC for GSOC Feedback
item.description: Clarifying a Core Data Model for PySAL Gist here From my perspective, I see my proposal for GSOC as containing two oblique foci. My hope in drafting this notebook for my fellow authors is to make this clear. I think at this point, many people who use & develop PySAL would like to see better tooling for Pandas$\leftrightarrow$PySAL interaction. This was started by Luc, Dani, & myself in the pysal.

item.title: Reflections on a hard-won win for PySAL
item.description: As a way to learn Python (and I mean really come to know it), I took on the project of converting PySAL to be compatible with Python 3. I started work on this two years ago. A tentative candidate for release is available in my fork Now, Iâ€™m glad I did this. I still worry about the day when Apple decides to ship the next OSX (Half Moon Bay? Big Sur?

item.title: Some New Realizations on Oooooold Material
item.description: For my TA appointment for the Masters in Applied Sciences program, I am having to generate some lectures on statistical theory. Because of some interest across the program in improving the statistics portion of the curriculum, I wrote about two weeks of lectures and assignments on spatial statistics, pushing from a start point of the Kolmogorov Axioms, fundamental results in elementary probability theory all the way up through spatial regression.

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Photo Caption: I guess this is how productivity works? Terminal sessions and web browsers. Seems like nothing else is needed nowadays. Though, I guess the guys over at LightTable would beg to disagree. I tried LightTable today for some LaTeX stuff. Seems like a brilliant tool there, if things like LyX or TexStudio didn’t exist. TexStudio in particular, my choice of LaTeX editor, does a wonderful job showing the structure of the workspace in one cohesive, intuitive way.
